name: Dragon Forest
description:
Dragon forest is a tricky and simple platformer in development, take 2 golden boxes back to your house to win. WASD to move

This game is my first take in games that aren't arcades, firstly this game was supposed to be an entry for the Community game jam but I gave up because 0% of the theme were being accomplished in the final product.

I might continue this game later, fix bugs that I already know that exists but couldn't find out the reason and add more in general.

I would appreciate to receive any feedback about this game in the comments.

Thank you.
